endpoints.name: GetProducts
endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of products. Can be filtered by category, price range, and sorted by popularity or ratings.

endpoints.name: GetProductDetails
endpoints.description: Provides detailed information about a specific product, including descriptions, images, and reviews.

endpoints.name: UserRegistration
endpoints.description: Allows new users to register. Requires user details such as name, email, and password.

endpoints.name: UserLogin
endpoints.description: Authenticates a user and provides a session token for subsequent requests.

endpoints.name: AddToCart
endpoints.description: Adds a specified product to the user's shopping cart.

endpoints.name: RemoveFromCart
endpoints.description: Removes a specified product from the user's shopping cart.

endpoints.name: UpdateCart
endpoints.description: Updates quantities of products in the shopping cart.

endpoints.name: Checkout
endpoints.description: Initiates the checkout process for the items in the shopping cart.

endpoints.name: ProcessPayment
endpoints.description: Processes payment for the order. Requires payment details like credit card information.

endpoints.name: OrderHistory
endpoints.description: Retrieves the order history of a user.

endpoints.name: ProductSearch
endpoints.description: Allows searching for products using keywords.

endpoints.name: SubmitReview
endpoints.description: Allows users to submit reviews for products they have purchased.

endpoints.name: GetCategories
endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of product categories available in the store.
